extends com.google.gwt.user.client.rpc.RemoteService

Method Detail

getTables

java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> getTables(DatabaseData inputs)
Gets a list of accessible tables in the database.

Parameters:
inputs - A DatabaseData object that contains information for creating a connection to a database.
Returns:
An ArrayList of table names. The first entry of the ArrayList is a "1" or a "0", a "1" signifies a successful execution. If there are any errors the ArrayList will contain two entries, a "0" and the exception caught.

getColumns

java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> getColumns(DatabaseData inputs)
Gets a list of accessible columns in the selected table from the database.

Parameters:
inputs - A DatabaseData object that contains information for creating a connection to a database and the name of the table in question.
Returns:
An ArrayList of column names. The first entry of the ArrayList is a "1" or a "0", a "1" signifies a successful execution. If there are any errors the ArrayList will contain two entries, a "0" and the exception caught.

addEntry

java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> addEntry(DatabaseData inputs)
Gets a list of accessible tables in the database.

Parameters:
inputs - A DatabaseData object containing information to be added to the configuration file.
Returns:
An ArrayList of Strings. The first entry of the ArrayList is a "1" or a "0", a "1" signifies a successful execution. If there are any errors the ArrayList will contain two entries, a "0" and the exception caught.

getCurrent

java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String[]> getCurrent()
Returns all data in the configuration file

Returns:
An ArrayList of the data, each String[] contains all the entries for one entry in the file.

deleteThisEntry

java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> deleteThisEntry(java.lang.String primaryKey)
Deletes an entry out of the configuration file

Parameters:
primaryKey - This is the primary key for the entry which is to be deleted.
Returns:
An ArrayList that will have 1 or 2 entries. The first entry will be either a "1" signaling a successful execution, or a "0" indicating an exception was thrown. The second entry will be the exception, if any, that was thrown.

getPreview

java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> getPreview(java.lang.String primaryKey)
Gets a "preview" of vocab terms from database entry.

Parameters:
primaryKey - This is the primary key for the entry in the config file for which the data is desired.
Returns:
An ArrayList that will have 2 or 12 entries. The first entry will be either a "1" signaling a successful execution, or a "0" indicating an exception was thrown. The second entry will be the exception, if any, that was thrown, or the Vocab Name. If it was successful the next 10 entires are ten entries from the vocab.
